job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
     * Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

   What s in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data/privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.
job_details.full_text:
Customer Success Engineer

* Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.
     * Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.
     * Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.
     * Improving our customer service practices and support tools.
     * Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.
     * Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.
     * Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.
     * Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

   What s in it for you
     * Work with state-of-the-art technologies and become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
     * Doing good contribute to solving one of the key global challenges: the data/privacy dilemma.
     * Working with a young & ambitious team.
     * Monthly team outings and weekly Friday company catch-ups and drinks.
     * An awesome startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
     * Exciting work atmosphere with no shortage of treats, drinks, and social events.
     * Great and easily accessible office location in Amsterdam.
     * Flexible working arrangements and working from home.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on customer success, support, and operational improvements within a company's service offerings. While it mentions 'generative AI' as a potential technology to innovate support processes, it does not indicate that the role involves direct development, fine-tuning, or deployment of AI models. The core responsibilities are centered around customer advisory, solution deployment, and improving service practices, which aligns more with a customer-facing or operations role rather than a specialized AI engineering role. The mention of 'state-of-the-art technologies' and 'latest tools and developments in customer success' is too general to classify it as an ML or GenAI Engineer role without more specific technical duties related to AI model building or MLOps.

job_tasks.justification: The role involves assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale customer service operations, advising customers on optimizing solution use, and developing customer success metrics, all of which require understanding business goals and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Assessing and implementing strategies to improve and scale Syntho's customer service operations.

job_tasks.justification: Advising customers on how to optimize the use of the solution within their operational landscape requires understanding both the product and the customer's business context.
job_tasks.phrase: Advising customers on how to optimize the use of our solution within their operational landscape.

job_tasks.justification: Deploying and integrating a solution within organizations can involve technical implementation and integration tasks, which fall under software development or deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: Deploying and integrating our solution within a wide variety of organizations.

job_tasks.justification: Improving customer service practices and support tools involves understanding operational needs and implementing enhancements.
job_tasks.phrase: Improving our customer service practices and support tools.

job_tasks.justification: Developing and implementing customer success metrics requires understanding business objectives and how to measure success.
job_tasks.phrase: Developing and implementing customer success metrics to improve our services.

job_tasks.justification: Identifying and implementing new methods for improving customer service solutions involves strategic thinking and operational enhancements.
job_tasks.phrase: Identifying and implementing new methods for improving our customer service solution.

job_tasks.justification: Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing customer success, user experience, and support tools can involve operational aspects of managing software and systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Taking a proactive role in implementing and managing our customer success, user experience, and support tools.

job_tasks.justification: Exhibiting a mindset to push boundaries in customer service by looking for ways and technologies to innovate and enhance support processes requires strategic thinking and business awareness.
job_tasks.phrase: Exhibiting a mindset and drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies (e.g. generative AI) to innovate and enhance support processes.

soft_skills.phrase: drive to push boundaries in customer service by continuously looking for ways and technologies to innovate and enhance support processes.
become a front-runner with the latest tools and developments in customer success.
startup culture of responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
responsibility and freedom to turn your ambition into reality.
